def test_update_timeout(self):
    sock = random_sock()
    sm = messaging.SubMaster([sock,])
    timeout = random.randrange(1000, 3000)
    start_time = time.monotonic()
    sm.update(timeout)
    t = time.monotonic() - start_time
    assert t >= timeout/1000.
    assert t < 3
    assert not any(sm.updated.values())
